text: The Judo competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The tournament was scheduled to be held from 20–23 November at the World Trade Center Veracruz. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- ||−55 kgMen’s -55kg results | | | |- ||−60 kgMen’s -60kg results | | | |- ||−66 kgMen’s -66kg results | | | |- ||−73 kgMen’s -73kg results | | | |- ||−81 kgMen’s -81kg results | | | |- ||−90 kgMen’s -90kg results | | | |- ||−100 kgMen’s -100kg results | | | |- ||+100 kgMen’s +100kg results | | | |- ||TeamMen’s team results | Janier Pena Magdiel Estrada Ivan Silva Andy Granda Jose Armenteros Gilberto Solar Oscar Brayson | Javier Guedez Elias Pinero Mervin Rodriguez Nelson Lopez Sergio Mattey Pedro Pineda Wlunkis Herrera Jesus Aguero | Jeffrey Ruiz Augusto Miranda Gadiel Miranda Alexis Chiclana Rafael Ferrer Angel Dones Wander Mateo Lwilli Santana Marcos Fiquereo Cristhian Gomera Jesse de Leon Abel Montero Jose Vasquez |- |} ===Women's events=== {| |- ||−44 kgWomen’s -44kg results | | | |- ||−48 kgWomen’s -48kg results | | | |- ||−52 kgWomen’s -52kg results | | | |- ||−57 kgWomen’s -57kg results | | | |- ||−63 kgWomen’s -63kg results | | | |- ||−70 kgWomen’s -70kg results | | | |- ||−78 kgWomen’s -78kg results | | | |- ||+78 kgWomen’s +78kg results | | | |- ||TeamWomen’s team results | Dayaris Mestre Yanet Bermoy Aliuska Ojeda Maricet Espinosa Onix Cortés Yalennis Castillo Idalys Ortiz | Edna Carrillo Mónica Hernández Karla Tapia Andrea Gutiérrez Andrea Poo Miriam González Vanessa Zambotti | Diana Ortíz Anrriquelis Barrios Wisneybi Machado Karen Leon Jormary Palma Naibet Chirinos Emileidys López María García Luisa Jiménez Juana Villanueva Katherine Otaño Leidi Germán Eliveri Villanueva Isandrina Sánchez |- |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Category:2014 Central American and Caribbean Games events Category:2014 in judo Category:Judo at the Central American and Caribbean Games
title: Judo at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games
